data.text: @LideralaR Te hemos dado una respuesta por Inbox. Saludos.
@DavidH_CHV Hi, please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@CornejoFontalba Esperamos brindarte asistencia oportuna en una próxima ocasión. Quedamos atentos a tus futuras consultas y requerimientos.
@CornejoFontalba Hola Caro, por este medio te podemos asistir, por favor envíanos al DM los detalles de tu requerimiento. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@MarciaSchuck1 Hola, te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.
@antonieta_cl You can send it with no problem to DM
@antonieta_cl The passport number. Regards
@martina98042820 For a proper assistance we need the information that we ask before. Regards
@martina98042820 Please send us the information that was sent before to make the respective validations. Regards
@JoeGoozey Hello Joe, we have checked the status of the refund, and we can see that were sent to payment, please keep waiting. Regards

@martina98042820 Hello Martina, in order to assist you, we kindly ask you to provide us via DM with the following information: LATAMPASS number, 
- Date of birth.
- Your full name.
- E-mail address.
- Identification number.
@charlielamont57 Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@thinkingurl Rest assured that all sanitary measures are taken to take care of your well-being and that of all passengers traveling with us. We will deliver your comments to the Management involved. Regards.

@thinkingurl Hi, please send us in a detailed way your doubts and concerns by DM, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

urls.title: Cheap flights with LATAM Airlines USA | Official Site
urls.description: Take advantage of the incredible discounts and flight deals offered by LATAM Airlines. Book your trip now and enjoy the best experience

data.text: @gabrielorazi88 Hello, prices, availability and purchase of tickets can be done by entering the link https://t.co/XFrJYSvXuv, fares are subject to change and availability without prior notice. We can assist you; bear in mind that through our assisted channels it is an extra charge per passenger.
@digamesea Hi, please let us know via DM if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.
@GenaroLaymuns Hola, te respondimos vía DM, saludos.

@MarciaSchuck1 Hello, we would like to ask you information about your ticket (13 numbers) also confirm the information about the person who belongs the refund, please all the information through DM 
We will stay tuned, regards
@GenaroLaymuns Hola, te hemos respondido por DM. Saludos.
@Lu_Berro Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations.
@ncury Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@ShahidKhalfan We will be waiting for you to send us the information. Regards.
@ShahidKhalfan Hello, tell us by DM how we can help you. We stay tuned.
@irwlasagna We understand your discomfort and our team in charge of this situation does everything in its power to provide you with an answer in this regard. Regards.

entity.name: WhatsApp
entity.description: WhatsApp Messenger, or simply WhatsApp, is an internationally available American freeware, cross-platform centralized instant messaging and voice-over-IP service owned by Meta Platforms.

data.text: @irwlasagna Please try to communicate with our baggage area through WhatsApp, so they can check more easily, since due to the high flow of calls, sometimes the system can disconnect them in the transfer process. Best regards.

entity.name: WhatsApp
entity.description: WhatsApp Messenger, or simply WhatsApp, is an internationally available American freeware, cross-platform centralized instant messaging and voice-over-IP service owned by Meta Platforms.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @irwlasagna Hello, we would recommend you to communicate directly with our baggage department via WhatsApp here: https://t.co/xWz3db1KYL, through our contact center: https://t.co/jedHSJlIBQ, and request for your call to be transferred to them. Best regards.

@pablo_marques Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@RodHagerty Hola, estamos para servirte. En caso tengas alguna duda o requerimiento adicional no dudes en escribirnos vía DM. ¡Saludos!

urls.title: Centro de ayuda, resuelve tus preguntas | LATAM Airlines

data.text: @RodHagerty Hola, si viajas con menores de 2 años, puedes llevar un coche plegable. Si no hay disponibilidad de espacio en la cabina, será enviado a la bodega sin costo adicional. Puedes visualizar lo mencionado ingresando al siguiente enlace: https://t.co/oacUZJOzL2. Saludos.
@stephenlgomez10 Hello, please provide us with more details about your requirement via DM. We'll stay tuned.
@AjCaroline79 Hello, please message us through DM in order to provide you a better assistance. We will be looking forward. Kind regards.
@catgaleano You are very welcome, we hope to see you soon ✈
@catgaleano Hello, we want to inform that you can enter to our VIP Lounge if you are a LATAM passenger traveling in a Premium Business or Premium Economy cabin. Kind regards.
@kammo2106 There should not be any problem during the check in. Regards.
@kammo2106 It depends on the taxes of each country. You can do the purchase on the Peruvian site, but the payment might not go through as you're not located on the country you're purchasing. Regards.
@kammo2106 Hello, please send us a DM with the details of your requirement. We stay tuned.

@Edwin97634417 Hola, comprendemos tu incomodidad debido a los inconvenientes mencionados. Nos encontramos trabajando en tu caso y en poder brindarte la respuesta de este a la brevedad posible. Agradecemos tu comprensión y te pedimos aguardar nuestro contacto. Saludos.

data.text: @DeclanL1994 Hi, we ask you to delete the cookies and browser history and try to make the purchase here: https://t.co/yfUcGVfrKw or try to use a different browser or device (preferably a computer). In case the problem still persists, please DM us a screenshot of the error. Regards.
@cairinthecity We recommend you to remove your comment as you're sharing the information of your reservation. Please contact us with the information requested via direct message. We'll stay tuned.

@cairinthecity Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

data.text: @SandyBeach29 Hello, the refund would be to the original payment method, however, in the event that we detect inconveniences or delays in the refund process, we need a backup bank account details in order to speed up the process by bank transfer. This information is mandatory to proceed.

@mszurmuk Hello, to help you in the best possible way, tell us through inbox the code of your reservation (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the traveler and the PIR code you received in airport for the claim. We will be waiting for your answer. Greetings.

data.text: @GloriaVeintimi1 @LATAM_CO @LATAMAirlines @Quiport @Delta @AirCanada @janethinostroza @LaPosta_Ecu @el_telegrafo @tctelevision Hola, si cuentas con un número de caso, bríndanoslo por DM a fin de verificar detalles. Quedamos atentos.

@iamkhanice Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@GloriaVeintimi1 Hola, escríbenos vía DM con tu número de reclamación (si cuentas con el mismo) o bríndanos tu código de reserva, nombre de uno de los pasajeros y código P.I.R. (Parte de Irregularidad de Equipaje) si realizaste el reclamo correspondiente en aeropuerto. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@PoloBuddayH20 Hello Polo, please provide us more information through DM. We stay tuned. Regards.
@ncury Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@AguinagaRoxy We were looking your case, and we noticed that it is being attended by our area in charge, we kindly ask you to wait for a response of our department as soon as possible. Best regards.
@AguinagaRoxy Hello, provide us more information through DM in order to give you a better assistant. We stay tuned. Best regards.

@ViniciusVidica Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@SheyVGV Hello, please provide us with your case number via DM. We'll stay tuned.
@jericciuti Hello, if you have already created the reservation, and you did not add your frequent flyer number at that time; you can do it at the airport counter before your flight. Best regards.
@gringo_rio You are welcome. Kind regards.

@gringo_rio Hi, direct flights from/to Miami and Salvador Bahia continue to be suspended until further notice. We recommend that you keep up to date with our operation through our website. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@yuletide Hello, please send us a DM with the screenshot of the error. We stay tuned.
@jackitzia Hello, to review and provide you with adequate assistance, please send us by DM the case number associated with the situation you are telling us about. We stay tuned.
@chatruc Hola, por este medio no sería posible generar la solicitud de hospedaje, por lo que se debía realizar la validación en aeropuerto. Saludos.
@chatruc Hola, entendemos tu malestar ante la situación, puedes generar un reclamo en el siguiente enlace: https://t.co/T314i2MvKN. Saludos.
@daytraderdavey Hi, we have sent you a DM request. Regards.

@Sandy_Tin Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@vjdosoretz Hola, te sugerimos ocultar el comentario en el cual brindas tu número de caso y ticket, ya que es información personal. Asimismo, te hemos respondido vía DM. Saludos.
@vjdosoretz Hola, para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español, inglés o portugués) para comunicarnos. Quedamos atentos.

@rchanario Hello, to help you in the best possible way, tell us through DM the code of your reservation (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the traveler. We will be waiting for your answer. Greetings.
@Anative_son Hello, we just sent you a DM. Regards.
@SonOfaKeef Hola, te enviamos una respuesta por DM. Saludos.

@souzajosue Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@moacyrpassador Hello, please tell us by DM your reservation code or ticket number and the full name of the passenger; and we appreciate you giving us more details of the difficulty you are having. We stay tuned.
@filtered_genius Hello, please tell us by DM your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger; so we can review and provide you with options.
@BillyGu59404770 Hola, bríndanos todos los detalles de lo sucedido e indícanos tu código de reserva y/o número de orden vía DM para poder asistirte por favor. Estaremos a tu respuesta.
@SonOfaKeef Hola, por favor indícanos de que manera te podemos ayudar por medio de DM (mensaje privado). Estaremos pendientes de tu respuesta. Saludos.

@MaverickUbu We are the LATAM Airlines Social Networks group. Please send us in a detailed way by DM your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@MaverickUbu Hoping you are doing well, we deeply apologize for all the inconveniences caused, and also thank you for keeping us informed about this situation, as it allows us to improve both the level of service and attention for our members. Regards.
@SteveDayton4 We will stay tuned. Regards.
@SteveDayton4 Hi, please provide us via DM with the Travel Voucher number and the number, type and country of issuance of your identity document (passport or national ID). We will stay tuned.
@WokeCatto Hi, please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations and assist you through this channel. Regards.
@holly_atkins Hello, please send us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. We stay tuned.
@ramitxo Hola, envíanos vía DM mayor información sobre tu requerimiento para poder asistirte. Quedamos atentos. ¡Saludos!
@NateItOrLoveIt Please provide us with the information via DM. We're looking forward to your response.
@NateItOrLoveIt Hello, please provide us with your case number via email. We'll stay tuned.

urls.title: Empathy Seat.
urls.description: Empathy is our ability to identify ourselves with someone and share their feelings.❤ During this Pride Month, we invite everyone to live this experience in ...

data.text:
It’s today, it’s today! ❤️ On LGBTQIA+ Pride Day, we would like to share with everyone the best moments of the Empathy Seat. It’s an unforgettable experience to feel identified with the stories on our Spotify Playlist. We invite you to listen to them! https://t.co/2cgcUYlBTS
🏳️‍🌈 https://t.co/SCtntRZeFf
@SeanacPgh Hello Jim, tell us through DM how can we assist you. Regards.
@Mehul_Gupta3 Hello, please send us to our DM your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@JCQ2222 Hello, please provide us with more information about your requirement via DM. We'll stay tuned.

@jhernandezsb Hello, we can assist you through this means, please send us via DM the booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passengers. We'll stay tuned. Regards
@lauraaen Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@belalui Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@edgardcafe Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via DM more details of your requirement and the associated booking reference, ticket number and full name of the passenger. We will stay tuned for your information.

@andrejunior76 Bom dia, André. Ficamos preocupados com o seu comentário. Gostaríamos de entender melhor o que aconteceu. Por favor, detalhe o ocorrido e informe via DM o seu e-mail e código de reserva, se tiver. Obrigado.

@souleyfocused Jennifer, please create a case through the last link sent so that the area in charge can assist you, in this way the area in charge will contact the airport to follow up on your request and be able to contact you. Regards.

@souleyfocused Hello, we are deeply sorry for your loss, to assist you in the best way, please tell us via Inbox, your full name, ticket number, document number (DNI, ID or RUT), Bag Tag (luggage tag) and PIR (airport claim number). We are looking forward to your response. Regards.

@dialronu Your browser's history or cookies can sometimes affect the web page. For this reason, we ask you to delete them and try to make the purchase one more time, or try to use a different browser or device. In case the problem still persists, send us a screenshot of the error. Regards

@opinali Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@AD_MD Hello, please provide us by DM with your Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), along with the full name of the passenger and also your email. Regards.
@hiantonio_ Hola, para poder asistirte bríndanos vía DM tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 números) y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@ivaspolaor Hello, please tell us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger.
@sam45654552 Hello, please provide us with your case or protocol number via DM. We'll stay tuned.

Empathy is the ability to identify ourselves with someone and share their feelings. During Pride Month, we invite you to live this experience through our Empathy Seat. Get to know these 5 moving stories from the LGBTQIA+🏳️‍🌈 community #WeOnlyLabelLuggage https://t.co/SevnQKfLFf
@theblasianmegan Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

Sit down, fasten your seat belt and make yourself comfortable!
On this Pride Month, an experience that will make everyone live empathy in an unprecedented way is coming soon 🌈 Get ready!
#WeOnlyLabelLuggage 💖 https://t.co/H55k6mTukM
@mahn_andy Hi, in order to assist you, please send us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
